thread.title: Cosy, friendly and brilliantly located
thread.title_full: Cosy, friendly and brilliantly located - Review of Villa Opera Drouot, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: m_evason
title: Cosy, friendly and brilliantly located
text: I stayed in Villa Opera Drouot in February with 2 of my children. The reception staff we really friendly and helpful - first in moving our rooms to be closer together - and second in helping us to plan our travel around the city. The rooms are really distinctive, spacious and cosy - also clean and have everything you need. There is very little noise from the street below. The location is very central - 5 mins walk to the nearest Metro and right on a nice street with restaurants, bars and shops and a nice feel. We were really pleased with the hotel and would definitely stay again.
